page.title: 02Councils
page.content: We asked a local councillor several questions and found out that Rye town council has only 16 councillors and they have no real powers and only suggest things to the district councils. The Mayor is elected for a year at a time by the council. However the Rother District council has powers and 45 councillors. Their main office is at Bexhill. East Sussex county council has the most power and 70 councillors. The main office is at Lewes. Rye is the proud possessor of four very fine maces and a beautiful mayoral chain. Two of the maces, dating back to 1766 are so magnificent that they have been copied as the official maces of the official maces of the Canadian Parliament.
